metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Click  Add me  to add yourself as a counter signer.
Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
•
Interactive forms : These contain fields that you can select and fill in You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the
form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons Acrobat
also allows you to send your completed forms to others and securely save them in Adobe
cloud storage It could be a paper form or PDF that
hasn’t been optimized for form filling

To create an interactive form, use the  Prepare Forms  tool See  Create a form from an existing
document

The document is now ready to add any fields that you want the signers to fill in or sign Simple authoring:
•
Is limited to the most common types of fields:
•
Text input (All Text fields are flagged as Required)
•
Signature
•
Signer's name (Printed)
•
Signer's email
•
Signature date (Read-Only; Supplied by the system)
•
Checkbox
•
Places fields anywhere you click on the document Advanced authoring:
•
Allows access to  all field types  (highlighted in yellow)
•
Supports  form field detection  (highlighted in green)
•
Supports  Prefill  fields  (highlighted in pink)
•
Supports  field assignment  (highlighted in purple and pink)
•
Supports  field validation
•
Supports  calculated fields
•
Supports  conditional fields
•
Allows  control of the field text font/appearance
•
Places fields by dragging them from the menu on the right side of the document Prepare the Agreement and Add Fields:
You can now add any necessary fields to the agreement The combined document is opened for you to add fields

Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool
to fill in flat forms You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the  Prepare Form  tool or
enabling the  Fill & Sign  tools

That means those fields will be available to
the signer for filling the information and signing the form This mode provides simplified authoring with the capability of assigning fields to
multiple signers The assigned colors
to the signers make it easy to distinguish the fields for respective signers When you select a signer from the right pane and add fields in the
form, the fields are assigned to the signer •
You can switch the assignee of any field using the floating toolbar
